trans-unit.source: Performs symmetric encryption and decryption using the Cryptographic Application Programming Interfaces (CAPI) implementation of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 执行对称加密和解密使用高级加密标准 (AES) 算法的加密应用程序编程接口 (CAPI) 实现。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: There is no supported key size for the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 没有当前平台支持的密钥大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric AES decryptor object using the current key and initialization vector (IV).
trans-unit.target: 创建对称 AES 解密器对象使用当前的密钥和初始化向量 (IV)。

trans-unit.source: A symmetric AES decryptor object.
trans-unit.target: 对称的 AES 解密器对象。

trans-unit.source: The current key is invalid or missing.
trans-unit.target: 当前密钥无效或缺失。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric AES decryptor object using the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
trans-unit.target: 创建对称 AES 解密器对象使用指定的键和初始化向量 (IV)。

trans-unit.source: The secret key to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 要用于对称算法的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The initialization vector to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 要用于对称算法的初始化向量。

trans-unit.source: A symmetric AES decryptor object.
trans-unit.target: 对称的 AES 解密器对象。

trans-unit.source: key or iv is .
trans-unit.target: keyor iv is .

trans-unit.source: key is invalid.
trans-unit.target: key是无效的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric AES encryptor object using the current key and initialization vector (IV).
trans-unit.target: 创建对称 AES 加密器对象使用当前的密钥和初始化向量 (IV)。

trans-unit.source: A symmetric AES encryptor object.
trans-unit.target: 对称的 AES 加密器对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric encryptor object using the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
trans-unit.target: 创建对称加密器对象使用指定的键和初始化向量 (IV)。

trans-unit.source: See the code examples in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.LegalBlockSizes%2A> properties to determine the size of the `key` and `iv` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅中的代码示例<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.LegalBlockSizes%2A>属性来确定的大小`key`和`iv`参数。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.LegalBlockSizes%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The secret key to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 要用于对称算法的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The initialization vector to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 要用于对称算法的初始化向量。

trans-unit.source: A symmetric AES encryptor object.
trans-unit.target: 对称的 AES 加密器对象。

trans-unit.source: The key or iv parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The key or iv parameter is .

trans-unit.source: key is invalid.
trans-unit.target: key是无效的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Generates a random initialization vector (IV) to use for the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 生成的随机初始化向量 (IV) 要用于该算法。

trans-unit.source: The initialization vector (IV) could not be generated.
trans-unit.target: 无法生成初始化向量 (IV)。

trans-unit.source: Generates a random key to use for the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 生成用于算法的随机密钥。

trans-unit.source: The key could not be generated.
trans-unit.target: 无法生成密钥。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the symmetric key that is used for encryption and decryption.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于加密和解密的对称密钥。

trans-unit.source: The symmetric key that is used for encryption and decryption.
trans-unit.target: 用于加密和解密对称密钥。

trans-unit.source: The value for the key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 键的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The size of the key is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 密钥的大小无效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置大小，以位为单位的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The minimum size of the key is 128 bits, and the maximum size is 256 bits.
trans-unit.target: 密钥的最小大小是 128 位，并最大大小是 256 位。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bits, of the key.
trans-unit.target: 大小 （以位为单位的密钥）。
